Solidarity orig-instes in various modes:

(a) Common delict, when several oo-delinquents incur a liability to indemnifieation.

Both Correality and Solidarity, as implying an integral but alternative obligation, lie in the mean between two extremes: on the one side, divided or partial (pro rata) liability3 and on the other side, the multiple or cumulative liability, generated by delicts that give rise to bilaterally penal suits (4 ξ 6).
